case.title: Seeking someone special - 27 (West London )
case.text:
Thank you for reading my posting.
I am well educated, good career, vey active lifestyle, well travelled, is looking for a lady for a friendship and if things go well, maybe more. Very open minded and an excellent sense of humour. Lady should be very respectful, independent, educated, sense of humour and willing to keep my with the active lifestyle :-)
Look forward to hearing your replies
